format: BitBake recipe (metadata for build system, not a typical programming language source file)
description: This file is a BitBake recipe snippet for building the rxvt-unicode terminal emulator. It includes metadata, dependencies, configuration options, patching, compilation, and installation steps.

methods.name: do_configure
methods.description: Prepares configuration files if not already present.

methods.name: do_compile
methods.description: Appends compilation flags and definitions to config.h.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Installs icons and desktop entry files to the target directory.
